Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
What are Family History Conferences?

Family History Conferences are sponsored by Brigham Young University - Idaho. Conferences provide instruction on how to find information about your ancestors and other related topics. They are held in both the Rexburg and the Boise areas. Suggested topics will meet the needs of the beginner, as well as the experienced genealogist.

When do the Family History Conferences take place?

Family history conferences occur periodically throughout the year. Upcoming conference dates are:

  • April 28, 2012--Boise
  • April 21, 2012--Rexburg
  • October 20, 2012--Boise

Participation Requirements

Family History Conferences are open to anyone interested in genealogy.

Cost Information

The cost of each conference is $11 for both prior registration and at-the-door registration, if available.

Registration Information

Registration may be completed online, by mail, by phone, or by fax. Register online now for the Boise or Rexburg conferences.
